risks: License activation below 50% after first value

gap_analysis: Two legacy teams still using external SCM

drivers: CI builds per billable user at 46

early_warning_flags.title: Engagement declining
early_warning_flags.trigger: Attendance below 80% for two consecutive meetings
early_warning_flags.impact: Risk of stalled adoption and executive disengagement
early_warning_flags.recommended_action: Schedule sponsor alignment call and confirm next agenda

early_warning_flags.title: License utilization below target
early_warning_flags.trigger: Utilization below 60% after first value milestone
early_warning_flags.impact: Adoption stagnation and renewal value risk
early_warning_flags.recommended_action: Run user activation audit and launch adoption campaign

early_warning_flags.title: Success plan objective at risk
early_warning_flags.trigger: Objective behind schedule with blockers unresolved
early_warning_flags.impact: Regulated apps remain unscanned; compliance risk
early_warning_flags.recommended_action: Escalate security policy approval and schedule Secure workshop

drivers.detail: Use case adoption at 3 green, but license utilization is 42% (target 80%).
drivers.action: Launch activation campaign and onboard the next 50 users.

drivers.detail: Engagement declining and renewal window opened at 151 days.
drivers.action: Schedule executive alignment call and confirm renewal success criteria.

drivers.detail: 2 of 3 success plan objectives on track; security objective behind.
drivers.action: Run Secure workshop and unblock regulated app scanning.

drivers.detail: NPS 34 and exec feedback positive in last EBR.
drivers.action: Capture a reference story for Q2.

drivers.detail: Cadence attendance at 76% with strong workshop participation.
drivers.action: Confirm next cadence agenda and maintain attendance above 80%.

ebr_templates.checklist:
EBR Checklist
- Confirm KPIs and success plan status
- Update renewal risk and mitigation
- Validate DORA and VSA metrics
- Capture executive feedback

engagement.cadence_notes: Cadence calls focus on operational adoption; EBRs focus on executive outcomes.

mitigation.task: Launch adoption campaign with team leads

risks.driver: Security scans enabled in only 12% of projects
risks.detail: SAST not running on regulated apps

objectives.title: Automate Tier-1 release workflows
objectives.baseline: Release cadence at 1x per week across Tier-1 apps
objectives.success_criteria: Deploy Tier-1 apps daily with automated approvals
verifiable_outcomes: Daily release pipeline for Tier-1 services
objectives.status_detail: On track; pipeline approvals configured for 6 of 12 apps.
blockers: Finalize release approval workflow for remaining apps
objectives.internal_notes: CSM notes: track blockers and stakeholder updates.
objectives.value_statement: Accelerates release frequency and reduces lead time for Tier-1 apps.

objectives.title: Expand CI adoption to 60% of projects
objectives.success_criteria: CI enabled on 60% of projects with >75% success rate
verifiable_outcomes: CI templates rolled out to top 20 projects
objectives.status_detail: On track; CI templates rolling out to top projects.
blockers: Complete runner scale-out for high-traffic repos
objectives.internal_notes: CSM notes: track blockers and stakeholder updates.
objectives.value_statement: Expands CI coverage to improve deployment reliability.

objectives.title: Enable security scanning for regulated apps
objectives.baseline: Security scans on 12% of regulated apps
objectives.success_criteria: SAST + dependency scans on all regulated apps
objectives.status_detail: At risk; regulated app teams awaiting security policy approval.
objectives.internal_notes: CSM notes: track blockers and stakeholder updates.
objectives.value_statement: Ensures regulated apps meet security and compliance requirements.

outcomes.value_detail: Lead time down from 14 to 7 days
outcomes.narrative: Delivery velocity improved across Tier-1 services with GitLab CI/CD adoption. The next focus is scaling Secure tooling to regulated apps.
value_points: Lead time reduced from 14 days to 7 days (50% faster).
Change failure rate decreased from 18% to 11%.
MTTR improved from 10 hours to 6 hours.

impact.customer_quote: Customer quote: "GitLab cut our delivery cycles in half and gave us clear visibility across teams."

recommendations: Introduce merge request templates for faster reviews
Automate approval rules for low-risk changes

activity.title: Executive summary shared
activity.detail: Renewal readiness checkpoint sent to sponsor

workshops.notes: Mapped release controls to GitLab approvals.
Enabled starter templates for top repos.

health.title: Health score triage
health.detail: Guidance for red and yellow accounts

week1: Review health score drivers with customer sponsor
Confirm success plan objectives and reset timelines
Schedule adoption workshop for lowest scoring use case
week2: Publish mitigation plan in collaboration project
Track adoption metrics weekly and share progress
ongoing: Monitor license utilization and engagement trends
Log risks and mitigations after each cadence call
escalation_triggers: Health score below 60 for two consecutive reviews
success_criteria: Success plan objectives back on track

week1: Initiate health score triage with CS leadership
Document top 3 risks and owners in collaboration project
Align on short-term recovery plan with executive sponsor
ongoing: Review progress weekly with CS leadership
Track risk mitigation tasks to closure
escalation_triggers: Renewal window < 90 days with no plan

objectives: Expand CI coverage to 60% of active projects.
Increase Secure adoption across regulated services.
Prepare premium analytics expansion business case.
hypotheses: If release approvals are standardized, more teams will shift deployments into GitLab.
If security policy blockers are removed, scan utilization can exceed 35% in one quarter.

renewal_readiness_checklist: Success plan objectives mapped to renewal goals
Executive sponsor aligned on Q2 priorities

workshop_plan.title: Release Enablement Workshop
workshop_plan.success_criteria: Increase Release use case score from 62 to 76 and expand deployment coverage from 6 to 10 teams.
workshop_plan.next_milestone: Confirm deployment template rollout to four additional teams by 2026-03-10.

workshop_outcomes.decisions: Agreed on shared release template standard and feature-flag rollout sequence.
workshop_outcomes.next_step: Track template adoption in monthly cadence with platform engineering.

workshop_outcomes.decisions: Aligned onboarding milestones and CI ownership model.
workshop_outcomes.next_step: Schedule Secure baseline follow-up workshop with security lead.

meta.notes: Escalation monitoring and renewal risk review.

checklist.task: Executive kickoff and success criteria aligned

risks: Delayed stakeholder engagement beyond AMER expectation.

objectives.title: Automate Tier-1 release workflows

blockers: Finalize release approval workflow for remaining apps

recommendations: Align approvers on a single release policy.
Reduce manual approval wait states in release pipelines.

workshop_catalog.title: Secure Workshop
workshop_catalog.detail: Security baseline configuration for regulated apps

workshop_plan.title: CI Adoption Recovery Workshop
workshop_plan.success_criteria: Move Verify score above 70 and enable CI on at least 50% of priority projects this quarter.
workshop_plan.next_milestone: Close runner-capacity blocker and publish migration owners by 2026-02-20.

workshop_outcomes.decisions: Escalated runner capacity issue and reassigned migration ownership.
workshop_outcomes.next_step: Finalize remediation plan in triage review and confirm workshop follow-up by 2026-02-19.
